title.rendered: Tastebudz Auto Seed Mix Pack – 4 top selling cannabis strains! 12 Seeds

content.rendered:
Tastebudz Auto Seed Mix Pack – 12 Premium Autoflowering Seeds, 4 Top Strains

Looking for a variety of tasty, easy-to-grow strains? Tastebudz Syndicate has you covered with our Auto Seed Mix Pack! This exciting mix includes 12 top-of-the-line autoflowering seeds, carefully selected from some of our best-performing genetics. Whether you’re a novice collector or an experienced enthusiast, this pack gives you a diverse range of strains to explore. And the best part? You get 12 seeds for the same price as a typical 10-pack — great value and plenty of options for your collection.

The Auto Seed Mix Pack includes four amazing autoflowering strains: Gorilla Gas, Cherry Cheesecake, Forbidden Fruitz, and Biscotti #33. Each strain comes individually labelled in a glass vial for easy identification, ensuring you always know exactly what you have in your collection. These strains have been selected for their unique flavours, effects, and rapid growth, giving you an enjoyable and stress-free cultivation experience.

Whether you’re after sweet fruit profiles, relaxing effects, or an energizing high, this pack has something for everyone. The convenience and variety offered by the Auto Seed Mix Pack make it the perfect choice for expanding your seed collection without the need to pick just one strain.

  • Gorilla Gas Auto – A potent hybrid with bold flavors and powerful effects.
  • Cherry Cheesecake Auto – Sweet and tangy with a delicious dessert-like profile.
  • Forbidden Fruitz Auto – A unique blend of fruity terpenes with a relaxing high.
  • Biscotti #33 Auto – Earthy, spicy, and a potent favorite for evening relaxation.

Whether you’re a novice or an experienced collector, these autoflowering seeds are perfect for anyone looking for quick harvests and minimal maintenance. Enjoy a variety of premium strains with this all-in-one mix.

📊 Auto Seed Mix Pack Strain Specs:

Feature Details
Genetics Gorilla Gas, Cherry Cheesecake, Forbidden Fruitz, Biscotti #33
Strain Type Autoflowering Hybrid
Flowering Time 8–9 Weeks (Autoflowering)
Indoor Yield Up to 500 g/m²
Outdoor Yield Up to 600 g/plant
THC Content Up to 25%
Flavours Fruity, sweet, dessert-like
Aromas Sweet, earthy, tropical hints
Effects Euphoric, relaxing, uplifting

💨 Why Choose Tastebudz Auto Seed Mix Pack?

🍰 Variety of premium autoflower strains – 12 seeds, 4 top genetics
🕒 Fast seed-to-harvest – 8–9 weeks from seed to finish
🌱 Perfect for beginners – Easy to grow with minimal maintenance
🌍 Available worldwide – Find a trusted retailer near you
📦 High-yielding strains – Get up to 600g per plant outdoors
🎁 Incredible value – Get 12 seeds for the price of a 10-pack

🍭 Flavour & Aroma of the Auto Seed Mix Pack Strains:

Each strain in the Tastebudz Auto Seed Mix Pack brings its own signature flavour and aroma to the table. From the sweet, tangy notes of Cherry Cheesecake Auto to the earthy, spicy undertones of Biscotti #33 Auto, this pack offers something for everyone. Enjoy complex, fruity aromas, dessert-like flavours, and hints of tropical and earthy undertones with every puff.

Looking for even more variety? Explore our other exciting mix packs! Tastebudz Auto Mix Pack 2 offers a fresh selection of autoflowering strains, while our Feminized Mix Pack features four top-tier feminized strains for a more focused experience. Both packs deliver the same quality and variety that Tastebudz Syndicate is known for. Dive into our full range and find the perfect mix for your collection today!

✨ Potency & Effects:

The Tastebudz Auto Seed Mix Pack offers a mix of euphoric, relaxing, and uplifting effects. Whether you’re in the mood for a creative burst or a calming evening, these autoflower strains have got you covered. With THC levels up to 25%, they provide a balanced high that will satisfy a wide range of collectors.

🌿 Seed Collector Notes:

These autoflowering strains are ideal for collectors who want fast results and high-quality genetics. Whether you’re adding them to an indoor or outdoor setup, these compact plants thrive with minimal effort, making them perfect for any collection. With a variety of terpenes, you’ll experience a wide range of tastes and effects — all from one convenient pack.

📜 Legal Note:

All Tastebudz Auto Seed Mix Pack cannabis seeds are sold strictly as collectible souvenirs in accordance with UK laws. Please ensure you comply with your local laws before purchasing.

🔗 Also Available From Our Official Retailers

Looking for the Tastebudz Auto Seed Mix Pack from a trusted seedbank near you? This pack is also available through our network of verified retailers.

🛒 Shop with confidence: View Our Full Retailers List → 🌍 (Including USA)

💡 We only partner with licensed, reputable sellers. For guaranteed authenticity, always purchase directly from Tastebudz Syndicate or our official partners.
